ournews.ournewstext1: Are you looking to buy professional equipment but not ready to shell out the full price? We have a solution for you! Learn about our convenient installment plan, which allows you to buy the equipment you need now and pay it off in installments. Visit the Checkout section for full details and to place your order today. Make your shopping more affordable with Clemar!
ournews.ournewstext2: Find out about our special offers and discounts! Visit the Promotions section to stay up to date with all of Clemar's great deals. Save on purchases and get additional bonuses. We are waiting for you on our social networks for even bigger surprises

about.abouttext: Welcome to the new website of Clemar, your trusted partner in the field of professional cleaning! Formerly known as egatoza market with more than 10 years of experience, we are pleased to introduce you to our updated and redesigned identity - Clemar. With us, you will get not only products, but also guaranteed quality and professionalism in every detail. Clemar is a leading distributor of more than 25 world brands specializing in cleaning equipment in Uzbekistan. Our assortment includes professional vacuum cleaners for dry and wet cleaning, as well as high-quality paper, napkins and paper towels. But of course, our main focus is scrubber dryers. At Clemar, you'll find a wide selection of cordless and corded dryers from world-famous brands. Our experience and professionalism allow us to offer you only the best solutions for maintaining cleanliness in any environment. We are already proud to cooperate with well-known companies, and our reputation in Uzbekistan confirms our place among the best. Clemar is not just a supplier, it is your reliable partner in the struggle for cleanliness and order. Join us, Clemar-nit and provide your business with the highest standard of cleaning and hygiene.

In the Clemar range you will find professional vacuum cleaners for dry and wet cleaning, as well as high-quality paper, napkins and paper towels.
